*********************************************************
Works 100%

1] Install the game

2] Run the v1.01 update .exe from UPDATE folder & update the game

3] Copy the content from the SKIDROW folder to C:Program Files >> Ubisoft >> Ubisoft Game Launcher

4] Play the game.

***********************************************************
